price: E vërteta është prej Zotit Tënd; pra, kurrsesi mos u bëj nga ata që dyshojnë.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
